name: JumpR (Zokerino)
description:
This is a simple game. Or... is it?

In this game you have to use your skill to carefully guide your little square to the exit by dashing your way up using the walls, but it's not that easy.  Strategically  placed spikes will ruin your day by sending you back to the beggining.

Are you skilled enough to leave the pit?

Let's see, shell we?
